verses.text: \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, give \w thought|strong="H2142"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* troubles;

\w How|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H5087"\w* \w an|strong="H7650"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* gave \w his|strong="H3068"\w* word \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* great \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, saying,

\w Truly|strong="H0518"\w*, \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w bed|strong="H3326"\w*,

\w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* sleep \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* rest \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* eyeballs,

\w Till|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* got \w a|strong="H4672"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w a|strong="H4672"\w* resting-place \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* great \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*.

\w We|strong="H8085"\w* \w had|strong="H4672"\w* news \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w it|strong="H4672"\w* \w at|strong="H7704"\w* \w Ephrathah|strong="H0672"\w*: \w we|strong="H8085"\w* \w came|strong="H4672"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* wood.

Let \w us|strong="H0935"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* tent; let \w us|strong="H0935"\w* \w give|strong="H0935"\w* \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* \w at|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.

\w Come|strong="H6965"\w* back, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* resting-place; \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*.

Let your \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H3548"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*; \w and|strong="H3548"\w* let your saints give \w cries|strong="H7442"\w* \w of|strong="H3548"\w* \w joy|strong="H7442"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w do|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* up \w your|strong="H7725"\w* king.

\w The|strong="H4480"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* \w true|strong="H0571"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, which \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w*, saying, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* kingdom \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w body|strong="H0990"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w your|strong="H8104"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* word, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0518"\w* teachings which \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w give|strong="H8104"\w* \w them|strong="H3427"\w*, \w their|strong="H1571"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w rulers|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H8104"\w* kingdom \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord's heart \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, desiring \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* resting-place.

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3427"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w rest|strong="H4496"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w ever|strong="H5703"\w*: \w here|strong="H6311"\w* \w will|strong="H3427"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w ever|strong="H5703"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3427"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w desire|strong="H0183"\w*.

\w My|strong="H1288"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1288"\w* \w will|strong="H0034"\w* \w be|strong="H1288"\w* \w on|strong="H3899"\w* \w her|strong="H1288"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w*; \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w her|strong="H1288"\w* \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* \w will|strong="H0034"\w* \w be|strong="H1288"\w* \w full|strong="H7646"\w* \w of|strong="H3899"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.

Her \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w will|strong="H2623"\w* \w be|strong="H3548"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*; \w and|strong="H3548"\w* her saints \w will|strong="H2623"\w* give \w cries|strong="H7442"\w* \w of|strong="H3548"\w* \w joy|strong="H7442"\w*.

\w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w I|strong="H6779"\w* \w will|strong="H5216"\w* make \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* \w of|strong="H7161"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* fertile: \w I|strong="H6779"\w* \w have|strong="H1732"\w* made ready \w a|strong="H8033"\w* light \w for|strong="H8033"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* king.

\w His|strong="H5921"\w* haters will be \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w shame|strong="H1322"\w*; \w but|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* will make \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w crown|strong="H5145"\w* shining.
